title: Understanding protein consumption: Survey
selftext:
Hello all, 

We need your valuable input! Please take a few minutes to fill out our survey. Your responses will help us gather important data for our research.

Since alternative food is on the boom, we are trying to understand the food habits particularly consumption of protein amongst Indians.  

We are not asking for your email Id and it’s not a marketing gimmick. It’s purely for research purpose. 
 
Click the link below to get started:

https://forms.gle/TzWdStGDsBwZ9YTeA

Thank you for your participation!
